description: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Official Solicitation
### Document Reference: `W8482-241710/A v1`

**Procurement Title:** Parts Kit, Ball Valve
**Procurement Reference Number:** `cb-6183-90408251`
**Submission Deadline:** _17 July 2023, 14:00:00 (Eastern Daylight Time)_

The Department of National Defence has a requirement for parts kits for ball valves, which will be used for delivery to CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax. The items must meet the specifications outlined in the solicitation document. Bidders proposing an equivalent or substitute product are required to provide the brand name and model, as well as the NCAGE (NATO Commercial and Government Entity Code).

**Quotations Required:** Suppliers wishing to provide parts kits in response to this solicitation are required to submit prices in Canadian dollars. 

**Canadian Content Preference:** Goods and services supplied under this contract are subject to a Canadian preference, as per the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Selection Criteria:** Proposals will be evaluated based on the specified requirements outlined in the RFP, with an emphasis on a combination of technical merit and price.

**Submission Requirements:**

The submission documentation can be downloaded from the Government of Canada electronic tendering system (https://canadabuys.canada.ca).

All submissions must be made in writing (as PDF attachments) in either English or French, and must not be received after the closing date.

A technical evaluation will be conducted to ensure that all submissions meet the specified requirements. Once a shortlist is established, bidders will be invited to submit a quotation for the items.

The Government of Canada retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

**Contact Information:**

Jean-Pierre Normandin
E-mail: [jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca](mailto:jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca)
Phone: (819) 939-3674

Notice URL: None (Submit documentation electronically)
Attachment: Parts Kit, Ball Valve (Download solicitation document)
Description: Parts kits for ball valves for delivery to CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax.
